contest-event.event-date:
May 9, 1959 D Grand Shield British Open Spring Festival (Grand Shield) 10 Test Piece Contest British Open Spring Festival grand-shield Winners back to 1952 are as engraved on the current Grand Shield trophy. Except for 1981 to 1984 where the bands on the trophy appear to have come second, not first! Was a different trophy given to the winners? If you know the answer please let us know.

There are also results on the trophy from 1902 to 1938, but they are for the Crystal Palace Contest (see link at top of page). Cordell Suite Belle Vue, Manchester, Greater Manchester, England, UK Prize: 1st: £75 Plus The Daily Express Challenge Shield 2nd: £50 Plus The Belle Vue 100 Guineas Challenge Trophy 3rd: £30 4th: £15 March 30, 2011, 5:18 p.m. March 30, 2011, 5:33 p.m. 1 Blackhall Colliery W. F.
